blogs.title: Introducing Programmatic AWS Landing Zone as Terraform Module
blogs.description: AWS Landing Zone is a solution that helps customers more quickly set up a secure, multi-account AWS environment based on AWS best practices.

blogs.title: Terraform for Serverless Series: Enhanced Management of AWS Fargate Tasks
blogs.description: According to official website AWS Fargate is a compute engine for Amazon ECS that allows you to run containers without having to manage servers or clusters. In this article I will provide some magic around how to build terraform configurations that provision and deploy serverless containers.

blogs.title: Terraform for Serverless Series: Enhanced Management of Amazon S3 Websites
blogs.description: Last week I started working on a new series of stories focused on terraform for serverless. Today I would like to double down on this approach and describe in details how our team provisions and deploys Amazon S3 with website hosting feature for static web pages or single page applications.

blogs.title: Terraform for Serverless Series: Enhanced Management of AWS Lambda Functions
blogs.description: I quickly became fascinated by terraform's simplicity and ease of use. As an engineer, you can tell when a tool just works

blogs.title: TerraHub.io - Serverless Computing London: Time To Make Terraform Serverless Friendly
blogs.description: I would like to invite you to argue with me (or against me) that it is time to make terraform serverless friendly

blogs.title: TerraHub CLI is Open Source and Free Forever
blogs.description: TerraHub is a terraform centric devops tool that simplifies provisioning and management at scale of cloud resources and cloud services across multiple cloud accounts

blogs.title: TerraHub.io Serverless Architecture in Action
blogs.description: When we started working on TerraHub CLI, our initial goal was to automate terraform execution and allow customer to trigger runs in self-service mode, as part of their existing GitHub and Jenkins pipelines

blogs.title: Introducing TerraHub.io — DevOps Hub for Terraform
